resources.string:
Nearby application is the first ever in bangladesh location based offer advertising system, where you can get to know about the nearby shops, concerts ,musical events ,restaurants, fast food shops, grocery. 

 Many offers running all around you but there is no centralised system where you can get to know about the offers. So we initiated a project to help the people get to attached with the offers nearby. 

 Come join the revolution
This Admin Login is for Nearby Marketeers for adding new offers in the Nearby Application Database
Section %1d is just a dummy section.
